1.content:
You are asleep, in bed having a vivid dream. You are going up to women you know and as you make physical contact with them. The start to moan, and shrink into whatever they are wearing.

But, you notice that it only lasts with how long, you touch them. It is exhilarating to you. To see women get dwindled down to whatever size you want them to.

As the dream continues, you start to want more. But as any dream is, it is fleeting. You alarm brakes through your dream and your slumber.

You get out of bed sluggishly, and curse your alarm. You walk to your bathroom to get ready for the day.

After you exit the shower. You look at the mirror and wipe the steam and condensation off to see your face. And staring back at you is the face of an...

Near the entrance of the school you are grabbed by a strong female hand
You get sent to the principle for showing up late.

Wait... it's SATURDAY! Why am i even here. You go somewhere else.
12.content:
... A 14 year old. You stop looking into the mirror and go to get you clothes for school on. "Hey, you better be ready up there!" You hear a bellow from down stairs.

"I am Hannah." You say back to the voice. The one that yelled at you was your step-mother Hannah. She is a woman of 5'6", with a nice figure. Red curly hair, and a mean streak a mile long. At least to you.

You live with her and her 2 dem- daughters, Angie, who is 19 and makes you do everything for her, she is a bit more on the chubby side, and hardly brushes her light brown hair. She also stand at 5'5" She teases you and try's to make your life as uncomfortable as possible.

Then there is, April. She is 16 and one of the popular girls of the high school. Her figure is that of her mother's. But, stands a few inches shorter. She usually keeps her hair in a pony tail.

As you finish getting ready, you wonder how you got into this mess. Your mother passed away when you were 9, and your father was extremely grief stricken. So one day he gone to a bar and that is where he mit Hannah. They hit it off after that and got engaged in about a year. Your father then started having to work abroad. Making it where you only get to see him at Christmas. You sigh as you got finished getting dressed and head down stairs.

"There you are took you long enough." Hannah says as she eats. "You best start heading to school now or you would be late. Also when you get back I expect you to get all the choirs done before bed tonight." She adds without even looking at you.

"Alright, i will." You say heading out the door. As you head to school, you notice something unusual. It is in the brush up ahead and it is glowing a blueish color. As you dicide to get closer you see it is coming from a rock small enough to be held in your hand. Being a 14 year old, you don't see why picking it up is probably a bad idea. As you pick it up the glow starts to fade from it. As if it's power is transfering to you. You look at it and it ain't glowing no more. So you toss it further in the brush, and head to school.

13.content:
...20 year old man. You look at the bags of your eyes remembering last nights study session. You get dressed in your casual clothes, a red tee shirt, blue jeans and sneakers. And black leather gloves. Something that you have had to wear since you hit puberty.

Your name is max. And you have a condition that, if you touch a woman with your hands as long as you are in contact with her you can take away their size. Plus you found that to them it is pleasurable for them.

You found this out when in highschool, on your way back home after school. You passed an alley, and got pulled in by a woman, who looked like she was having withdraws. She stuck a knife up to your neck screaming for you to give her your money. As you reached in your pocket for it and pulled it out. Her hand made contact with yours. You watched as she moaned and started to shrink after your hands brushed against each other. Acting, quickly you grabbed her hand. Watching in astonishment as she shrank more and more, into her clothes as she moans in what you take as pain. But, later find out it was ecstacy. She got to about two feet tall when you see her shudder from an orgasm. Her clothes long since fell off her, with the knife used to mug you earlier on the ground forgotten. She stopped shrinking at a final height of 1 ft. She came down from her sexual high and took notice of her situation. And was scared of what you would do to her.

You came out of your shock and had a choice of what you could you remembered you...

132.content:
You remember freaking out, that a woman (much less the one trying to mug you) shrunk in front of your very eyes. Then looking at the diminished woman, seeing her quake and shiver. Looking up at the giant that she once thought was an easy mark, with fear in her eyes. You felt petty, you did not know of the circumstances that lead her to try mugging you. But, if you left her like this you knew she would die.

So with that in mind you grabbed her. Lift her felt like lifting a doll off the ground. As you held her in your hand, you felt the curves that graced her body. Looking at her face you saw the fear and wonder on it. She feared you, knowing that you had the upper hand now. But she was in wonder of the giant warm hand around her.

"Hey... what is your name?" You slowly asked the small woman.

She looked at you still afraid. "T-t-tam-tammy" she squeaked out. Hardly heard.

"Don't worry tammy if i wanted to hurt you i would have already." You reassure her. "I'm going to bring you to my place." You tell her.

She has a look of shock. "Wait, what are you going to do to me?" She asks.

"I don't know. Maybe, I should keep you as a pet." You tell her as you gather her things and throw the knife in the dumpster next to you.

You place her in your backpack and started heading home again. Once, you got there. You had gone straight to your room.

From that day, you kept tammy as your loving pet for many years. You later learned that touching your hand was how tammy shrunk. You had to eventually tell your mom and dad. Who were surprisingly accepting of your pet and newly discovered power. They made sure you wore gloves going out as to not accidentally shrink another person. But, after some tests you realized it only worked on women. If your wondering about tammy, she actually got quite used to being your pet. So much so that she never tried to escape or cause a fuss. She did really want to come with you to collage. But, you couldn't bring her. You did promise to bring her some friends back during spring break. She really perked up after that.

Shaking your head of those memories. You finished getting ready and headed for the door. Where to first...
132.title: Your loving pet, Tammy.

1321.content:
You head to the Library. You got a book report worth half your final grade due at the end of next week. As, you head into the Library, you see the head Liberian organizing books with her back to you.

Looking at her, you see that she is dressed in a white dress shirt and black skirt and high heels. Her black hair in a loose bun on the back of her head. The back of her skirt is stretched taut against her round ass. You can also see just under her skirt a white piece of fabric going in between those full cheeks. You try to look elsewhere or you might just go and grab that ass.

What do you do?

info.brief_description: You are a male that can shrink any woman you touch
info.description:
In this story, you are a guy that has gained the ability to shrink a woman any size you want or back to original height. But you must be touching them.

Alright rules:

- No giantess or growing women to above how tall they were.
- No shrinking yourself or other men it don't work like that. Unless the men turn into women then you can do so.
- Please add good sized additions.
- Anything else goes. Do what you want to the women. But just remember the rules above.
